EmailTemplate.name: 202004_Global_Connectivity_Tech-Sales_Aspire200_Webinar.Email 2 - Aspire200 Webi
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Webinar for Honeywell Aspire Satcom Solutions on April 23
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Honeywell Aspire Satcom Solutions Join Honeywell’s Technical Sales Manager, Preston Dane, with host Dan Stockfisch, for our upcoming webinar: Honeywell Aspire Satcom Solutions.
Specifically for our Honeywell dealers, this webinar will present all you need to know about Satcom – Safety, FANS, CPDLC and Cabin Internet. It will also answer questions like – what’s all this satellite stuff anyway? And will Satcom be the demise of HF Radio? Join our discussions about past, present and future of Satcom.
After attending this webinar, you'll be well-versed on planning customer Satcom upgrades by tailoring solutions to aircraft mission requirements spanning cockpits and cabin mandates. PLEASE REGISTER HERE <[[https://honeywell.zoom.us/j/475630566]]> If this email was forwarded to you and you'd like to be notified about upcoming webinar events directly, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Channel-Partner-Webinars-Opt-In.html]]> to let us know!
